servlet

Class ServletResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • servlet.ServletResource

  • @Path(value="/")
public class ServletResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic part of the api. Contains login, registration and logout
    Author:
    johannes@n3rdkeller.de

      • login

        @POST
 @Path(value="/login")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response login(java.lang.String input)
        Post request for login.
        Parameters:
        input - 
        {
  "login" : "username/email",
  "password" : "pw in plain text"
}
        Returns:
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "id":userID,
  "username":"username",
  "email":"email",
  "lastName":"last name",
  "firstName":"first name",
  "otherProperties":{
    "propertie1":"value",
    "propertie2":"value",
  },
  "successful":true
}

  "email":"email@text",

}

  "successful":true/false
}

      • checkUser

        @POST
 @Path(value="/register/checkuser")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response checkUser(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request for checkuser. Gets a List of all usernames and then checks if the user in in that list
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "username":"usernametext"
}
        Returns:
        {
  "username":"usernametext",
  "taken":true/false,
  "successful":true
}
